title: [TOOL] Evaluate colgrep as semantic code search tool
description: colgrep: semantic code search via ColBERT embeddings + tree-sitter. CLI tool, not embeddable library. Could be exposed as external tool or MCP server. Not a grep-searcher replacement (different purpose: semantic discovery vs exact matching). v1.0.7, 290 downloads. See ai/research/rmcp-and-colgrep-crates-2026-02.md
